    • Constructor Detail

      • FakeWebCameraConnector

        public FakeWebCameraConnector(java.net.InetAddress address,
                              int port,
                              java.lang.String username,
                              java.lang.String password)
        Create a fake web camera connector. It can generate random bytes to form a fake video stream. Call startGeneratingFakeData() to start generating.
        Parameters:
        address - WEBCAM_LOGIN_PARAM of the web camera.
        port - Port opened of the web camera.
        username - Username for login.
        password - Password for login.

      • FakeWebCameraConnector

        public FakeWebCameraConnector(WebCameraConnector.LoginParam loginParam)
        Create a web camera connector.
        Parameters:
        loginParam - Parameters for login.

    • Method Detail

      • startGeneratingFakeData

        public void startGeneratingFakeData()
        Start generating fake data and fill to the video stream.

      • stopGeneratingFakeData

        public void stopGeneratingFakeData()
        Stop generating fake data. Note that after stopping, the video stream is still valid, and you can start generating again.

      • getStream

        public java.io.InputStream getStream()
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Get the real-time video raw-bit stream from the camera. Subclasses are encouraged to ensure users from different threads can get correct video stream individually.
        Specified by:
        getStream in class WebCameraConnector
        Returns:
        Real-time video raw-bit stream from the connected web camera.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
